holistic_ikigai_analysis.methodology: 3-phase comprehensive analysis using full context windows
holistic_ikigai_analysis.primary_ikigai: Hands-on stewardship of personal technology and security—finding small, steady satisfaction in keeping accounts protected, devices synced, and tools responsive.
secondary_areas: Cause-driven social connection through sport, especially memorial and charity golf events
Everyday readiness and wellbeing supported by wearable prompts and quick, practical actions

supporting_evidence.pattern: Prompt attention to account security and device events, suggesting calm and satisfaction from making systems work as intended
examples: New sign-in detected for your Microsoft account
A sound was played on N E S’s Apple Watch

supporting_evidence.pattern: Engagement with a memorial charity golf event indicates meaning in honoring others and contributing to a health cause via social sport
examples: RE: INVITATION: 6th Annual Edition of the Kohler Cup in memory of Rod and for Pancreatic Cancer Action, Friday 3rd October 2025 at Goodwood
Re: INVITATION: 6th Annual Edition of the Kohler Cup in memory of Rod and for Pancreatic Cancer Action, Friday 3rd October 2025 at Goodwood

supporting_evidence.pattern: Inbox dominated by low-ikigai, low-autonomy items; meaning shows up in brief, intentional touchpoints rather than long threads
Preference for short trigger-action cycles over extended correspondence (alerts prompt immediate resolution)
examples: New sign-in detected for your Microsoft account
A sound was played on N E S’s Apple Watch

framework_dimensions.external_connection: Connects through technology and selective community events—uses devices to stay organized and engages in cause-linked gatherings (e.g., charity golf) for social meaning.
framework_dimensions.active_engagement: Acts quickly on alerts and invitations (reply chains and device pings), showing hands-on, solution-focused behavior over passive consumption.
framework_dimensions.emotional_meaning: Derives reassurance and quiet pride from keeping things safe and working; finds significance in honoring a person (Rod) and supporting pancreatic cancer action via sport.
framework_dimensions.voluntary_pursuit: Charity event participation is clearly voluntary; tech caretaking is partly prompted by alerts but embraced as a chosen, gratifying routine.
framework_dimensions.everyday_joy: Small wins such as locating a watch with a ping, clearing a security alert, and confirming attendance create daily feelings of order, readiness, and connection.
framework_dimensions.growth_orientation: Natural path to deepen skills in digital security/automation and expand community impact by pairing sport with fundraising or volunteer roles.

recommendations: Create a weekly 15-minute 'systems tidy' ritual (review security alerts, backups, updates) and note one small win to reinforce daily satisfaction.
Channel tech stewardship into community value: help a friend/family member harden accounts or set up wearables; consider a simple checklist you can share.
Lean into cause-driven sport: commit to the Kohler Cup early, invite one person, and set a modest fundraising goal (e.g., a per-hole pledge) to add meaning.
Use the Apple Watch for wellbeing micro-rituals (brief walks, breath sessions) that pair readiness with mood lift; track a single daily streak.
Reduce low-autonomy noise: unsubscribe or filter routine system mail into a 'Triggers' folder and convert only key items into tasks.
Pursue one micro-learning on account security or automation (e.g., passkeys, authenticator flow, or Shortcuts) and apply immediately to your setup.
After events, capture a two-sentence reflection (what felt meaningful, who you connected with) to reinforce the social-purpose dimension of your ikigai.

methodology_details.phase_1: Holistic overview analysis across all emails to extract themes and patterns
methodology_details.phase_2: Contextual per-email scoring using holistic insights
methodology_details.phase_3: Synthesis and validation for comprehensive ikigai profile
methodology_details.context_window_optimization: Adaptive batching based on model capabilities
methodology_details.inclusive_approach: Analyzes ALL email types including commercial for complete picture
